product_name: Isis Splash Rain Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Next time the sky starts to grumble, go for the Isis Splash jacket. This featherweight, waterproof and breathable coat packs technical features into a street savvy silhouette. Waterproof XPR fabric with taped seams outperforms other materials by pulling moisture away from the skin and spreading it across the surface to speed evaporation and drying. Adjustable, roll-down hood with brim; zippered under-arm vents; Taffeta- and mesh-lined zippered hand pockets; elastic and rip-and-stick cuffs; drawcord hem; reflective trim. Closeout.
short_description: Next time the sky starts to grumble, go for the Isis Splash jacket. This featherweight, waterproof and breathable coat packs technical features into a street savvy silhouette.
